thread.title_full: Corporate Social Responsibility Weekly Recap (July 1, 2015 – July 15, 2015)

title: Corporate Social Responsibility Weekly Recap (July 1, 2015 – July 15, 2015)
text: Thursday, July 16, 2015 3:40PM IST (10:10AM GMT) Corporate Social Responsibility Weekly Recap (July 1, 2015 – July 15, 2015) New York, United States The following releases focus on Corporate Social Responsibility and moved during the weeks of July 1, 2015 – July 15, 2015. CHICAGO -- ADM Donates $325,000 to Promote Clean Waterways Source: Archer Daniels Midland Company TORRANCE, Calif. -- Phenomenex Raises $19,450 for American Red Cross in Soccer Charity Cup Source: Phenomenex, Inc. DALLAS -- Perot Museum of Nature and Science Announces Innovative Kosmos Energy STEM Teacher Institute to Empower Teachers in Science Instruction Source: Kosmos Energy CHICAGO -- Hyatt to Partner with Khan Academy to Bring Open-Source Global Learning to Colleagues and Communities Source: Hyatt
